title: Project Kickoff - Q1 Initiative
summary: Kickoff meeting for Q1 initiative to improve team collaboration and increase productivity by 20%. Project involves implementing a new project management and communication platform with AI-powered workflow automation. Three main phases: pilot (Feb 15), full rollout (Mar 31), and full onboarding (end of Q1).
key_points: Three main objectives: improve collaboration, reduce meeting overhead, increase productivity by 20%
Phase 1: Pilot with engineering team by Feb 15
Phase 2: Full rollout to all teams by Mar 31
Phase 3: Full onboarding by end of Q1
Focus initial automation on email management and meeting scheduling
Need security review and legal approval - security to be fast-tracked
Key principles: no downtime, backward compatibility, prioritize UX
Weekly sync established for Tuesdays at 2 PM
key_decisions: Prioritize email management and meeting scheduling automation first
Establish weekly Tuesday 2 PM sync to track progress
Use project wiki as single source of truth for documentation
Pilot with 2-3 engineering teams before full rollout

action_items.task: Prepare detailed resource plan including time estimates for each phase
Draft automation engine specification and requirements
Coordinate with security team for fast-tracked security review
Schedule and conduct architecture finalization meeting
Coordinate with HR on resource allocation
Select and coordinate with pilot participant teams

next_steps: Deep dive on automation requirements once architecture is finalized
Weekly progress sync starting next Tuesday
risks: Timeline may be aggressive - needs resource allocation confirmation
Rework risk if automation requirements change after architecture is finalized
